name: Targeted Advertising
description: Displaying advertisements to a consumer where the advertisement is selected based on personal data obtained from that consumer's activities over time and across nonaffiliated websites or applications to predict preferences or interests.

name: Sale of Personal Data
description: Exchange of personal data for monetary consideration by the controller to a third party.

name: Profiling
description: Automated processing of personal data to evaluate or predict aspects relating to a consumer, where such profiling produces legal or similarly significant effects.

name: Sensitive Data Processing
description: Processing of sensitive data, including health, biometric, child, and precise geolocation data.

name: General Processing
description: General collection, use, storage, disclosure, analysis, or deletion of personal data by the controller.
